summary.span: 提供控制物件存取權的能力，而不需直接管理存取控制清單 (ACL) 。

span.span: Provides the ability to control access to objects without direct manipulation of Access Control Lists (ACLs).

param.name: identityReference

span.span: The access mask is a 32-bit collection of anonymous bits, the meaning of which is defined by the individual integrators.

param.name: isInherited
param.span: 如果這個規則繼承自父容器則為 true。

span.span: true if this rule is inherited from a parent container.

span.span: Specifies the inheritance properties of the access rule.

param.name: propagationFlags
param.span: 指定是否自動傳播繼承的存取規則。

span.span: Specifies whether inherited access rules are automatically propagated.

param.span: 如果 inheritanceFlags 設為 ，則忽略傳播旗標。

span.span: The propagation flags are ignored if inheritanceFlags is set to .

param.name: type

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法傳回的安全性描述元資訊目前在記憶體中。This method returns the security descriptor information currently in memory. 它不會擷取在永久性儲存體儲存的資訊。It does not retrieve information saved in permanent storage.

protected: abstract bool ModifyAccess(System::Security::AccessControl::AccessControlModification modification, System::Security::AccessControl::AccessRule ^ rule, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % modified);

param.name: modification
param.span: 要套用至 DACL 的修改。

param.name: rule
param.span: 要修改的存取規則。

span.span: The access rule to modify.

param.name: modified
param.span: 如果成功修改 DACL，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the DACL is successfully modified; otherwise, .

summary.span: 將指定的修改套用至與這個 物件關聯的判別存取控制清單 (DACL)。

span.span: Applies the specified modification to the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object.

returns.span: 如果成功修改 DACL，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the DACL is successfully modified; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免不小心讓主體的存取權，應用程式應該檢查是否有允許所有人的完整存取 (權限 AEFA) 存取控制項目 (ACE)，並將它移除之前修改 DACL。To avoid unintentionally allowing access to principals, applications should check for the existence of an allow everyone full access (AEFA) access control entry (ACE) and remove it before modifying a DACL.

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Persist(class System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle handle, valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections includeSections) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Persist (handle As SafeHandle, includeSections As AccessControlSections)

abstract member Persist : System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle * System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections -> unit override this.Persist : System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle * System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections -> unit

param.name: handle
param.span: 用來擷取保存資訊的控制代碼。

span.span: The handle used to retrieve the persisted information.

param.name: includeSections
param.span: 列舉值的其中一個，指定安全物件的安全性描述元 (存取規則、稽核規則、擁有者、主要群組) 的區段。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the sections of the security descriptor (access rules, audit rules, owner, primary group) of the securable object to save.

summary.span: 將與這個 物件相關聯的安全性描述元的指定區段儲存到永久儲存體。

span.span: Saves the specified sections of the security descriptor associated with this object to permanent storage.

summary.span: 建議傳遞至建構函式和保存方法之 參數的值應完全相同。

span.span: We recommend that the values of the parameters passed to the constructor and persist methods be identical.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當保存物件，如果的值`includeSections`參數傳遞至方法並不相同的值`includeSections`參數傳遞至建構函式用來建立該物件、 區段保存的物件可以包含無法預測的值。When persisting a object, if the value of the `includeSections` parameter passed to the method is not identical to the value of the `includeSections` parameter passed to the constructor used to create that object, sections of the persisted object can contain unpredictable values. 比方說，如果建構函式呼叫`includeSections`的值，和更新版本使用該物件上呼叫方法`includeSections`的值，所產生的保存物件會包含無法預測其稽核規則、 群組和擁有者的值。For example, if a constructor is called with an `includeSections` value of , and later a method is called on that object with an `includeSections` value of , the resulting persisted object will contain unpredictable values for its audit rules, group, and owner.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetAccessRuleProtection (bool isProtected, bool preserveInheritance);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetAccessRuleProtection(bool isProtected, bool preserveInheritance) cil managed
Public Sub SetAccessRuleProtection (isProtected As Boolean, preserveInheritance As Boolean)
public: void SetAccessRuleProtection(bool isProtected, bool preserveInheritance);

param.name: isProtected
param.span: 表示保護與 物件相關聯的存取規則不受繼承； 表示允許繼承。

span.span: to protect the access rules associated with this object from inheritance; to allow inheritance.

param.name: preserveInheritance
param.span: 表示要保留繼承存取規則； 表示移除繼承的存取規則。

span.span: to preserve inherited access rules; to remove inherited access rules.

param.span: 如果 isProtected 為 ，就會忽略這個參數。

span.span: This parameter is ignored if isProtected is .

summary.span: 設定或移除與 物件相關聯的存取規則保護。

span.span: Sets or removes protection of the access rules associated with this object.

summary.span: 受保護的存取規則無法透過繼承來由父物件所修改。

span.span: Protected access rules cannot be modified by parent objects through inheritance.

exception.span: 這個方法會嘗試從非標準判別存取控制清單 (DACL) 中移除繼承的規則。

span.span: This method attempts to remove inherited rules from a non-canonical Discretionary Access Control List (DACL).

span.span: This method attempts to remove inherited rules from a non-canonical System Access Control List (SACL).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetGroup(class System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference identity) cil managed

param.name: identity
param.span: 要設定的主要群組。

span.span: The primary group to set.

summary.span: 設定與 物件相關聯的安全性描述元主要群組。

span.span: Sets the primary group for the security descriptor associated with this object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetOwner(class System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference identity) cil managed

param.name: identity
param.span: 要設定的擁有者。

span.span: The owner to set.

summary.span: 設定與 物件相關聯的安全性描述元擁有者。

span.span: Sets the owner for the security descriptor associated with this object.

summary.span: 從指定的二進位資料，設定這個 物件的安全性描述元。

span.span: Sets the security descriptor for this object from the specified binary data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要包含的二進位資料所代表的安全性描述元`null`其判別存取控制清單 (DACL)，單一的存取控制項目 (ACE)，可讓每個人對於完整存取 (權限 AEFA) 就會加入至 DACL。If the security descriptor represented by the binary data contains `null` for its discretionary access control list (DACL), a single access control entry (ACE) that allows everyone full access (AEFA) is added to the DACL. 如果應用程式修改已新增權限 AEFA ACE 的安全性描述元的 DACL，權限 AEFA ACE 會保存使用 DACL，保存該 DACL。If an application modifies the DACL of a security descriptor to which an AEFA ACE has been added, the AEFA ACE is persisted with the DACL when that DACL is persisted. 這會導致應用程式不小心讓主體的存取。This can result in an application unintentionally allowing access to principals. 基於這個原因，應該檢查有權限 AEFA ACE 的應用程式，並將其移除再修改任何安全性描述元中。Because of this, an application should check for the existence of an AEFA ACE and remove it before modifying any security descriptor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm(unsigned int8[] binaryForm) cil managed

param.name: binaryForm
param.span: 要從中設定安全性描述元的位元組陣列。

span.span: The array of bytes from which to set the security descriptor.

summary.span: 從指定的位元組值陣列，設定這個 物件的安全性描述元。

span.span: Sets the security descriptor for this object from the specified array of byte values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要包含的二進位資料所代表的安全性描述元`null`其判別存取控制清單 (DACL)，單一的存取控制項目 (ACE)，可讓每個人對於完整存取 (權限 AEFA) 就會加入至 DACL。If the security descriptor represented by the binary data contains `null` for its discretionary access control list (DACL), a single access control entry (ACE) that allows everyone full access (AEFA) is added to the DACL. 如果應用程式修改已新增權限 AEFA ACE 的安全性描述元的 DACL，權限 AEFA ACE 會保存使用 DACL，保存該 DACL。If an application modifies the DACL of a security descriptor to which an AEFA ACE has been added, the AEFA ACE is persisted with the DACL when that DACL is persisted. 這會導致應用程式不小心讓主體的存取。This can result in an application unintentionally allowing access to principals. 基於這個原因，應該檢查有權限 AEFA ACE 的應用程式，並將其移除再修改任何安全性描述元中。Because of this, an application should check for the existence of an AEFA ACE and remove it before modifying any security descriptor.

span.span: Sets the specified sections of the security descriptor for this object from the specified array of byte values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要包含的二進位資料所代表的安全性描述元`null`其判別存取控制清單 (DACL)，單一的存取控制項目 (ACE)，可讓每個人對於完整存取 (權限 AEFA) 就會加入至 DACL。If the security descriptor represented by the binary data contains `null` for its discretionary access control list (DACL), a single access control entry (ACE) that allows everyone full access (AEFA) is added to the DACL. 如果應用程式修改已新增權限 AEFA ACE 的安全性描述元的 DACL，權限 AEFA ACE 會保存使用 DACL，保存該 DACL。If an application modifies the DACL of a security descriptor to which an AEFA ACE has been added, the AEFA ACE is persisted with the DACL when that DACL is persisted. 這會導致應用程式不小心讓主體的存取。This can result in an application unintentionally allowing access to principals. 基於這個原因，應該檢查有權限 AEFA ACE 的應用程式，並將其移除再修改任何安全性描述元中。Because of this, an application should check for the existence of an AEFA ACE and remove it before modifying any security descriptor.

summary.span: 從指定的安全性描述元定義語言 (SDDL) 字串，設定這個 物件的安全性描述元。

span.span: Sets the security descriptor for this object from the specified Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 SDDL 字串所代表的安全性描述元包含`null`其判別存取控制清單 (DACL)，單一的存取控制項目 (ACE)，可讓每個人對於完整存取 (權限 AEFA) 就會加入至 DACL。If the security descriptor represented by the SDDL string contains `null` for its discretionary access control list (DACL), a single access control entry (ACE) that allows everyone full access (AEFA) is added to the DACL. 如果應用程式修改已新增權限 AEFA ACE 的安全性描述元的 DACL，權限 AEFA ACE 會保存使用 DACL，保存該 DACL。If an application modifies the DACL of a security descriptor to which an AEFA ACE has been added, the AEFA ACE is persisted with the DACL when that DACL is persisted. 這會導致應用程式不小心讓主體的存取。This can result in an application unintentionally allowing access to principals. 基於這個原因，應該檢查有權限 AEFA ACE 的應用程式，並將其移除再修改任何安全性描述元中。Because of this, an application should check for the existence of an AEFA ACE and remove it before modifying any security descriptor.
